name: Miko Clothes
description:
Version 1.0

This is my first post. The trigger word is 'miko clothes,' but it becomes stable when you also include 'white chihaya' and 'red hakama.'

Version 2.0

This is an experimental version for my own study, and I cannot yet say that it has achieved satisfactory results. The training model is AOM3A2.

The unique feature of this version is the addition of five options for miko clothes: long sleeves, detached sleeves, side breasts, long hakama, and hakama skirt. This allows for the customization of your favorite miko outfit. See prompts of my illustrations.

Due to the influence of teacher images or overfitting, I have not yet achieved complete control.

modelVersions.name: v2.0
modelVersions.description:
This is an experimental version for my own study, and I cannot yet say that it has achieved satisfactory results. The training model is AOM3A2.

The unique feature of this version is the addition of five options for miko clothes: long sleeves, detached sleeves, side breasts, long hakama, and hakama skirt. This allows for the customization of your favorite miko outfit. See tags of my illustrations.

Due to the influence of teacher images or overfitting, I have not yet achieved complete control.
